trans-unit.source: Represents the control that redistributes space between columns or rows of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Grid" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il controllo che ridistribuisce lo spazio tra le colonne o le righe di un controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Grid" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control redistributes space between rows or columns in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>, without changing the dimensions of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> controllo ridistribuisce lo spazio tra righe o colonne in un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>, senza modificare le dimensioni del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.

trans-unit.source: For example, when a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> resizes two columns, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> property of one column is increased while at the same time the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> property of the other column is decreased by the same amount.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, quando un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> ridimensiona due colonne, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> della proprietà di una colonna viene incrementato allo stesso tempo la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> della stessa quantità della proprietà di altra colonna è ridotto.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows how to define a horizontal or vertical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties and by leaving the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> properties set to their default values.
trans-unit.target: Nella tabella seguente viene illustrato come definire un orizzontale o verticale <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> impostando il <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> proprietà e lasciando la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> sono impostate sui valori predefiniti.

trans-unit.source: **How to create vertical and horizontal GridSplitter controls**
trans-unit.target: **Come creare controlli GridSplitter verticali e orizzontali**

trans-unit.source: GridSplitter type
trans-unit.target: Tipo di oggetto GridSplitter

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> value
trans-unit.target: Valore di <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> value
trans-unit.target: Valore di <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: Resizes rows
trans-unit.target: Ridimensiona le righe

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Top>, <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Bottom>, <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Center>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Top>, <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Bottom>, <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Center>

trans-unit.source: Resizes columns
trans-unit.target: Ridimensiona le colonne

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Left>, <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Right>, <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Center>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Left>, <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Right>, <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Center>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A> is greater than or equal to <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>, this resizes the columns.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A> è maggiore o uguale a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>, ridimensiona le colonne.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A> is less than <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>, this resizes the rows.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A> è minore di <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>, ridimensiona le righe.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> can overlap a row or column that contains other content, or it can occupy a row or column by itself.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> possono sovrapporsi a una riga o colonna che contiene altre informazioni, o può occupare una riga o colonna da se stesso.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to define a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>, see [How to: Resize Rows with a GridSplitter](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-rows-with-a-gridsplitter.md) and [How to: Resize Columns with a GridSplitter](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-columns-with-a-gridsplitter.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su come definire un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>, vedere [procedura: ridimensionare le righe con un oggetto GridSplitter](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-rows-with-a-gridsplitter.md) e [come: ridimensionare le colonne con un oggetto GridSplitter](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-columns-with-a-gridsplitter.md).

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> property settings do not achieve the desired <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> behavior, you can change the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> property settings.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> non consentono di ottenere le impostazioni delle proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> comportamento, è possibile modificare il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> le impostazioni delle proprietà.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> may be obscured by other objects that are contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> può essere nascosto da altri oggetti contenuti nel <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A> insieme il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to prevent this situation, see [How to: Make Sure That a GridSplitter Is Visible](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-make-sure-that-a-gridsplitter-is-visible.md).
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni su come evitare questa situazione, vedere [procedura: verificare che un oggetto GridSplitter sia visibile](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-make-sure-that-a-gridsplitter-is-visible.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: Proprietà di dipendenza per questo controllo potrebbe essere impostata dallo stile predefinito del controllo.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: Se una proprietà viene impostata da uno stile predefinito, la proprietà può variare rispetto al valore predefinito quando il controllo viene visualizzato nell'applicazione.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: Lo stile predefinito è determinato dal tema del desktop viene utilizzato quando l'applicazione è in esecuzione.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [temi WPF predefiniti](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to define a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> that resizes columns in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> by overlaying the edge of a column.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come definire un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> che ridimensiona le colonne in un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> sovrapponendo il bordo di una colonna.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to define a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> that resizes columns in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> and that occupies a column in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come definire un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> che ridimensiona le colonne in un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> e che occupa una colonna di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum distance that a user must drag a mouse to resize rows or columns with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la distanza minima alla quale un utente deve trascinare mediante il mouse un controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> per ridimensionare le righe o le colonne.

trans-unit.source: A value that represents the minimum distance that a user must use the mouse to drag a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> to resize rows or columns.
trans-unit.target: Valore che rappresenta la distanza minima alla quale un utente deve trascinare mediante il mouse un controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> per ridimensionare le righe o le colonne.

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è 1.

trans-unit.source: The minimum distance that is defined by <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement%2A> is reinitialized continually as the user drags the mouse.
trans-unit.target: La distanza minima che è definita da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement%2A> viene reinizializzata continuamente mentre l'utente trascina il mouse.

trans-unit.source: For example, when you drag the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement%2A> amount, the rows or columns are resized.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, quando si trascina il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> dal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement%2A> quantità, le righe o colonne vengono ridimensionate.

trans-unit.source: To resize the rows and columns more, you must drag the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> the same amount.
trans-unit.target: Per ridimensionare le righe e colonne di altre, è necessario trascinare il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> della stessa quantità.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, changes to column and row sizes that are made by using the mouse or the keyboard to move the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> are made in multiples of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Modifica di conseguenza, le dimensioni delle colonne e righe che vengono eseguite utilizzando il mouse o tastiera per spostare il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> vengono effettuate in multipli del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo dell'identificatore

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Impostare le proprietà dei metadati `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: nessuno

trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come impostare la proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la proprietà di dipendenza <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance that each press of an arrow key moves a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la distanza alla quale un controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> viene spostato ogni volta che si preme un tasto di direzione.

trans-unit.source: The distance that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> moves for each press of an arrow key.
trans-unit.target: Distanza alla quale il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> viene spostato ogni volta che si preme un tasto di direzione.

trans-unit.source: The default is 10.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è 10.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo dell'identificatore

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Impostare le proprietà dei metadati `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: nessuno

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.KeyboardIncrement%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come impostare la proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.KeyboardIncrement%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.KeyboardIncrement" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la proprietà di dipendenza <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.KeyboardIncrement" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates the implementation of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Crea l'implementazione di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> per il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" />.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridSplitterAutomationPeer" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Un nuovo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridSplitterAutomationPeer" /> per il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs" /> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Called when a key is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Chiamata eseguita alla pressione di un tasto.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs" /> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Called when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> control loses keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato quando il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> perde lo stato attivo.

trans-unit.source: Information about the change in size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" />.
trans-unit.target: Informazioni sulle modifiche relative alle dimensioni di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" />.

trans-unit.source: Responds to a change in the dimensions of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Risponde a una modifica relativa alle dimensioni del controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control determines what type of pointer to display after its <xref:System.Windows.Size> is set.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> controllo determina il tipo di puntatore da visualizzare dopo il relativo <xref:System.Windows.Size> è impostata.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style that customizes the appearance, effects, or other style characteristics for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> control preview indicator that is displayed when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview" /> property is set to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta lo stile che personalizza l'aspetto, gli effetti o altre caratteristiche dello stile per l'indicatore di anteprima del controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> visualizzato quando la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview" /> è impostata su <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Style" /> for the preview indicator that shows the potential change in <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Grid" /> dimensions as you move the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Style" /> per l'indicatore di anteprima che visualizza le modifiche potenziali apportate alle dimensioni dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Grid" /> mentre si sposta il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is the style that the current theme supplies.
trans-unit.target: L'impostazione predefinita è lo stile fornito con il tema corrente.

trans-unit.source: When you set styles, there are some restrictions.
trans-unit.target: Quando si impostano gli stili, esistono alcune restrizioni.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Styling and Templating](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md).
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni, vedere [Applicazione di stili e modelli](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md).

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso della sintassi XAML per gli attributi

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: Valori XAML

trans-unit.source: One of the following: `StaticResource` or `DynamicResource`.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei seguenti: `StaticResource` o `DynamicResource`.

trans-unit.source: See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md).
trans-unit.target: Vedere [risorse XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md).

trans-unit.source: The key that identifies the style being requested.
trans-unit.target: La chiave che identifica lo stile richiesto.

trans-unit.source: The key refers to an existing resource in a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: La chiave fa riferimento a una risorsa esistente in un <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.

trans-unit.source: Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended.
trans-unit.target: La sintassi degli elementi è tecnicamente possibile, ma non è consigliata.

trans-unit.source: See [Inline Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md).
trans-unit.target: Vedere [stili Inline e modelli](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md).

trans-unit.source: A binding reference using or <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> is also possible, but uncommon.
trans-unit.target: Un'associazione di riferimento utilizzando o <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> è anche possibile, ma non comune.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo dell'identificatore

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Impostare le proprietà dei metadati `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: nessuno

trans-unit.source: A preview of changes to row or column boundaries is displayed while the user drags the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control, and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Anteprima delle modifiche ai limiti di riga o colonna viene visualizzata quando l'utente trascina il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> (controllo) e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview%2A> è impostata su `true`.

trans-unit.source: The column and row boundaries are set when the user releases the mouse button.
trans-unit.target: Quando l'utente rilascia il pulsante del mouse, vengono impostati i limiti di riga e colonna.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la proprietà di dipendenza <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identificatore della proprietà di dipendenza <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets which columns or rows are resized relative to the column or row for which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> control is defined.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta le colonne o le righe da ridimensionare in base alla colonna o alla riga per quale è stato definito il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that indicates which columns or rows are resized by this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori di enumerazione che indica quali colonne o righe vengono ridimensionate dal controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.GridResizeBehavior.BasedOnAlignment" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.GridResizeBehavior.BasedOnAlignment" />.

trans-unit.source: To specify a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> that resizes rows or columns, set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Per specificare un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> che ridimensiona le righe o colonne, impostare il <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: If you cannot achieve the desired behavior by setting the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties, change the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> default values.
trans-unit.target: Se non è possibile ottenere il comportamento desiderato impostando il <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> proprietà, cambiano il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> i valori predefiniti.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Resize Rows with a GridSplitter](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-rows-with-a-gridsplitter.md) and [How to: Resize Columns with a GridSplitter](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-columns-with-a-gridsplitter.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [procedura: ridimensionare le righe con un oggetto GridSplitter](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-rows-with-a-gridsplitter.md) e [procedura: ridimensionare le colonne con un oggetto GridSplitter](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-columns-with-a-gridsplitter.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo dell'identificatore

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Impostare le proprietà dei metadati `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: nessuno

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come impostare la proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la proprietà di dipendenza <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior" />.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identificatore della proprietà di dipendenza <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> control resizes rows or columns.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> ridimensiona righe o colonne.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies whether to resize rows or columns.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori di enumerazione che specifica se ridimensionare righe o colonne.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.GridResizeDirection.Auto" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.GridResizeDirection.Auto" />.

trans-unit.source: To specify a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> that resizes rows or columns, set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Per specificare un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> che ridimensiona le righe o colonne, impostare il <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: If you cannot achieve the desired behavior by setting the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties, change the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> default values.
trans-unit.target: Se non è possibile ottenere il comportamento desiderato impostando il <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> proprietà, cambiano il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> i valori predefiniti.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Resize Rows with a GridSplitter](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-rows-with-a-gridsplitter.md) and [How to: Resize Columns with a GridSplitter](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-columns-with-a-gridsplitter.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [procedura: ridimensionare le righe con un oggetto GridSplitter](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-rows-with-a-gridsplitter.md) e [procedura: ridimensionare le colonne con un oggetto GridSplitter](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-columns-with-a-gridsplitter.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo dell'identificatore

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Impostare le proprietà dei metadati `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: nessuno

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come impostare la proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la proprietà di dipendenza <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> control updates the column or row size as the user drags the control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> aggiorna le dimensioni di colonna o di riga durante il trascinamento.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> preview is displayed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se viene visualizzata un'anteprima di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" />; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> requires an <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> object to be present in its parent tree in order to display drag preview feedback.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> richiede un <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> oggetto deve essere presente nella relativa struttura ad albero padre per visualizzare i commenti e suggerimenti anteprima di trascinamento.

trans-unit.source: This requirement is typically met by the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> object that is available in the default style for the <xref:System.Windows.Window> or in the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> object that is created by a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> object.
trans-unit.target: Questo requisito viene generalmente soddisfatto dal <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> oggetto disponibile nello stile predefinito per il <xref:System.Windows.Window> o nel <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> oggetto creato da un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: However, if neither of these is available, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control must define its own <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> object.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, se nessuno di questi è disponibile, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> controllo deve definire un proprio <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo dell'identificatore

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Impostare le proprietà dei metadati `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: nessuno

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview%2A> property is set to `true`, a preview of the change in the row or column sizes is shown.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview%2A> è impostata su `true`, viene visualizzata un'anteprima della modifica di dimensioni di riga o colonna.

trans-unit.source: The actual size changes when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> is released.
trans-unit.target: Le dimensioni effettive le modifiche quando il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> viene rilasciato.

trans-unit.source: If the property is set to `false`, the column or row sizes are updated in real time as the user drags the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control.
trans-unit.target: Se la proprietà è impostata su `false`, le dimensioni di colonna o riga vengono aggiornate in tempo reale mentre l'utente trascina il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> controllo.

trans-unit.source: If the keyboard is used to move the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control, column or row sizes are updated in real time even if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se si utilizza la tastiera per spostare il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> dimensioni di riga, colonna o controllo, vengono aggiornate in tempo reale anche se il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview%2A> è impostata su `true`.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come impostare la proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la proprietà di dipendenza <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview" />.
